colorTheory.description: The color palette is designed to provide high contrast and readability while incorporating a vibrant accent color for visual interest.
colorTheory.mood: The palette exudes a professional and modern feel with a touch of vibrancy.
colorTheory.accessibility: The contrast ratios between text and background colors meet WCAG AA standards for accessibility.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary color (#000000) and secondary color (#FFFFFF) create a strong contrast, with the accent color (#00A99D) adding a refreshing pop.
